text: Happy BDAY Florilla. @GovPhilScott my husband + I survived 1 of the worst pandemics, called #HIV #AIDS - perhaps you’ve heard of it? We can’t get a #vaccine in #vermont b/c you refuse to follow #CDC guidance on #EssentialWorkers. Maybe we’ll survive #COVID19, if not, it’s on Phil https://t.co/WKvM9yCstS
